name: eCommerce Search & Discovery UI Kit
description:
Free and open source design system with ready-to-use elements for building a best-in-class search & discovery experience in your eCommerce store.


100% customizable UI design prototypes to fit your brand.


Mobile responsive screens include:

  • Home
  • Multi-category Autocomplete
  • Search & Category Product Listing 
  • Filtering Panel
  • Product Detail with Recommendations
  • Checkout
  • Store Locator


This UI kit is created based on industry thought leaders' input and research such as Google's UX playbook and Baymard Institute.


If you have any feedback, please email contact@algolia.com
